column17:
Product Description

The Unique Formula Of Splat Semi Perm Hair Color Will Give Your Hair Vivid Color. This Long-Lasting Hair Color Forms A Protective Shield That Prevents The Color From Washing Out. Splat Hair Color Is A One-Application Kit That Includes Color Bleach And Peroxide. For Long-Lasting And Vibrant Color Use Splat Semi Perm Hair Color. Use On Unbleached And Natural Hair For A Subtle Hint Of Color. Use On Bleached Hair For An Extreme Intense Shocking Color. Long Lasting Semi Permanent Hair Paint. One Application Lasts Up To 6 Weeks.
